description: Streamlined testing processes by integrating MySQL into a Spring Boot application for storing test metrics, enabling detailed analysis and faster troubleshooting.
Incorporated Gradle framework to optimize development, build, and dependency management, achieving a 30% reduction in development time.
Implemented asynchronous task delegation using Spring, resulting in a 5% boost in application speed.
Designed and implemented a MySQL database using MariaDB, leveraged Redis Cache in Docker, and used Elasticsearch for faster search operations.
Enhanced application robustness by fixing vulnerabilities and duplicate code identified via SonarQube, reaching over 90% code coverage.
Built an automated pipeline to convert Excel payroll data into structured databases and JSON using Apache POI and Java, enabling web-based visualization and filter-based search.
Trained extensively in Java, SQL, NoSQL, Spring Boot, Scala, and Akka for 6â€“8 months as a Systems Trainee.
Developed applications to manage and transmit service data to client apps using RESTful Web services built with Java and Spring.
Designed and integrated REST APIs for a retail application and interfaced backend systems with Oracle SQL databases.
Engineered caching solutions using Spring to improve query performance and reduce response time by 30%.
Conducted code quality assessments using JUnit and Jacoco reports, achieving 90% test coverage across modules.
